testcase.name: Adding items to cart
testcase.system-out: Given User is on GreenCart Landing page.....................................passed When User searched with Shortname Tom and extracted actual name of product..passed And Added "3" items of the selected product to cart.........................passed Then User proceeds to Checkout..............................................passed And validates the item name in checkout page................................passed And verify user has ability to enter promo code and place the order.........passed
